Title:
Assessing Programming Language Impact on
Development and Maintenance: A Study on C and C++
Improved_SZZ: we attributed the bug to the previous release.
UseOF-SZZ: They for sure use the first part of the SZZ but the second part is used in a implicit way
Summary:
propose a novel methodology which controls for development
process and developer competence, and quantifies how the choice of programming language impacts software quality and developer
productivity.
Outcome:
found that using C++ instead of C results in improved software quality
and reduced maintenance effort, and that code bases are shifting from C to C++.
